events.Fire Temple Child FW Access:
can_use(Farores_Wind) and
                (at('Deku Tree Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Dodongos Cavern Beginning', is_child) or
                at('Jabu Jabus Belly Beginning', is_child) or
                at('Forest Temple Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Water Temple Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Spirit Temple Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Shadow Temple Entryway', is_child) or
                at('Bottom of the Well', is_child) or
                at('Ice Cavern Beginning', is_child) or
                at('Gerudo Training Grounds Lobby', is_child))
events.Fire Temple Adult FW Access:
can_use(Farores_Wind) and
                (at('Deku Tree Lobby', is_adult) or
                at('Dodongos Cavern Beginning', is_adult) or
                at('Jabu Jabus Belly Beginning', is_adult) or
                at('Forest Temple Lobby', is_adult) or
                at('Water Temple Lobby', is_adult) or
                at('Spirit Temple Lobby', is_adult) or
                at('Shadow Temple Entryway', is_adult) or
                at('Bottom of the Well', is_adult) or
                at('Ice Cavern Beginning', is_adult) or
                at('Gerudo Training Grounds Lobby', is_adult))
events.Fire Temple Child Fairy: has_hearts(2) or 'Fire Temple Child FW Access'
events.Fire Temple Adult Fairy:
can_use(Goron_Tunic) or has_hearts(5) or 'Fire Temple Adult FW Access' or
                at('DMC From Warp Pad 2 Hearts', is_adult) or
                ((Hover_Boots or Hookshot) and at('DMC From Goron City 3 Hearts', is_adult))

locations.Fire Temple MQ Map Room Side Chest: is_adult or Kokiri_Sword or Sticks or Slingshot or Bombs or can_use(Dins_Fire)
locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Chest:
(Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(1))) and
                ((logic_fire_mq_near_boss and can_use(Bow) and has_fire_source and (Goron_Tunic or has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy)) or
                (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and (Hover_Boots or Hookshot) and (Goron_Tunic or
                    has_hearts(3) or (fire_fairy and (has_hearts(2) or has_bottles(3))))) or
                (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (can_use(Hover_Boots) and (Goron_Tunic or has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy)) or
                    (can_use(Hookshot) and (Goron_Tunic or ((can_live_dmg(0.75) or Bow or Longshot) and (has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy))))))

exits.Fire Boss Room:
is_adult and Boss_Key_Fire_Temple and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(1))) and
                ((logic_fire_boss_door_jump and has_fire_source and (Goron_Tunic or fire_fairy or has_hearts(2))) or
                (Hover_Boots and has_fire_source and (Goron_Tunic or fire_fairy or has_hearts(2))) or
                (Megaton_Hammer and at('Fire Temple Upper', can_play(Song_of_Time) or has_explosives)))

locations.Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest: is_adult and (has_explosives or Megaton_Hammer or Hookshot)

locations.Fire Temple MQ Big Lava Room Blocked Doo:
has_explosives and has_fire_source and (Hookshot or logic_fire_mq_blocked_chest) and
                (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(3) or
                (fire_fairy and (has_hearts(2) or has_bottles(2))))))
locations.Fire Temple MQ GS Big Lava Room Open Doo: Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy))

exits.Fire Lower Maze:
(Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 2) and (has_fire_source or (logic_fire_mq_climb and Hover_Boots)) and
                (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(1) and
                    (has_hearts(6) or (fire_fairy and (has_hearts(3) or (has_bottles(2) and (has_hearts(2) or has_bottles(3))))) or
                    ((Hookshot or can_use(Farores_Wind)) and (has_hearts(2) and (fire_fairy or has_hearts(4)))) or
                    ((Hookshot and can_use(Farores_Wind)) and (has_hearts(3) or (fire_fairy and has_bottles(2)))))))
exits.Fire Boss Key Room:
'Fire Temple Big Lava Room Torches' and (Hookshot or logic_fire_song_of_time) and
                (can_use(Fire_Arrows) or (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Bow or logic_fire_mq_bk_chest))) and
                (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and (has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy))))

locations.Fire Temple MQ Lizalfos Maze Side Room C: has_explosives and (logic_fire_mq_maze_side_room or at('Fire Upper Maze', True))

exits.Fire Upper Maze:
((has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches) and can_use(Hookshot)) or
                (logic_fire_mq_maze_hovers and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or logic_fire_mq_maze_jump

locations.Fire Temple MQ GS Skull On Fire:
(can_play(Song_of_Time) and can_use(Hookshot) and (has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches)) or
                can_use(Longshot)
locations.Wall Fairy:
has_bottle and
                ((can_play(Song_of_Time) and can_use(Hookshot) and (has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches)) or
                    can_use(Longshot))

exits.Fire Temple Upper:
(Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 3) and
                (can_use(Fire_Arrows) or (Bow and Hookshot and (Goron_Tunic or has_hearts(2) or (Fairy and has_bottles(3)))))

events.Defeat Volvagia:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_volvagia_tunic and has_hearts(3) and 
                    ((has_hearts(4) and (has_hearts(17) or (fire_fairy and (has_hearts(8) or
                        (has_bottles(2) and (has_hearts(6) or (has_bottles(3) and (has_hearts(5) or has_bottles(4))))))))) or
                    (Bow and (has_hearts(14) or (fire_fairy and (has_hearts(7) or
                        (has_bottles(2) and (has_hearts(5) or (has_bottles(3) and (has_hearts(4) or has_bottles(4))))))))))))
